infos.value: You've done well to return unscathed. Good work.
You offer too much praise, Your Highness.
Enough with the pleasantries. At ease, Lu'Cia.
I don't mean it as a reward, per se...but I believe I shall entrust you with a new division.
There was, of course, someone who strongly recommended I do so.
Was it...Deputy Commander Ellshra?
Not just Ellshra. Rhaldor, too.
I can't believe it... The commander would never...
This is what Rhaldor said.
"We have entered the age of the gun."
"Lu'Cia possesses an immovable, steely spirit and unparalleled marksmanship."
"If you intend to establish a new division, there is no one more qualified than her to lead it."
That can't be... The commander gave me his approval...?
Rhaldor may be hard-headed and foul-mouthed, but he is not a fool by any measure.
He is a brave man who always thinks of Rundall first.
Yes, I believe that to be true. This past mission made it abundantly clear to me.
Well, then, don't let his goodwill be for naught.
Right.
Although his intention may be to energize his subordinates, choosing his words a little more carefully could go a long way in making him a trusted commander.
Well, perhaps he's just easily embarrassed.
Guns will dominate the world moving forward. I, too, believe this to be true.
...I have but one favor to ask.
Spit it out.
Transfer Creysse to the new division as well.
Very well. Rhaldor is bound to approve of it, too.
You have my gratitude.
...And for the new division's name?
A division name...
Or I could just name it for you.
Let us go with...«Calorum».
«Calorum», huh. Isn't something as ephemeral as the shimmer of heat perhaps a bit...inauspicious?
On the contrary. That which I seek is ever-shifting. Hence the shapelessness.
I see. How interesting.
Well, then, Lu'Cia. I hereby appoint you commander of Rundall's third divison, «Calorum».
I expect great things of you.
Yes, sir. I shall not fail to lead a division that will exceed all expectations.
In that case, let us begin with this...
How about you show this fellow a good time?
A good time, you say?
That's right.
Employ whatever means necessary.
Find out the identity of the one leaking information to Sadali from within Rundall.
Once he's coughed it all up, make an example out of him with his execution.
No, not just him. Snuff out every last one who would bear ill will towards Rundall.
Leave it to me. I will not hold back in the least.
Time to show you a ruthlessly good time.
Hahahaha. I knew I could count on you. I look forward to what's to come.
